items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glamorous BUT Runs Small
items.body: This sweater is beautiful and well made. I love it. It looks and feels expensive. However, I had to return it. Be careful of the size when ordering. Amazon recommended a M...which I order. I usually wear a small. The M was too small. On the sizing card attached to the sweater, the M = a size 6 in the US. I am going to take a chance and reorder in a L. Fingers crossed it fits. For reference, I am 5'2" and 135 lbs. I am small on top. Read more
items.author: Carol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Well-Made
items.body: I am 5'4" 155 lbs, 36C. Typically I wear a 10 or Medium in Tops. After reading the reviews, I sized up to a Large and even that was too small for the fit I wanted. The top had a gap and the short sleeve had no give. I ended-up returning the Large for an XXLarge which fits perfectly. I have a short torso, but it still hits exactly at the end of my waist. I'm not sure what's going on with the sizing, but it's way off. Went from my true Medium to an XXLarge to get a good fit. Otherwise, the sweater is surprisingly well-made, the embellished buttons are pretty and it's a great knock-off of another very expensive piece. I highly recommend this adorable sweater, just size up generously. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Quality of sweater and buttons looks good, unfortunately runs small. I ordered a large knowing this and it was still too small to button. Read more
items.author: STP

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Receiving sweater soil.
items.body: It was clear that I got a return sweater . The label was missing and the Neck collar. was soil. But the sweater itself is beautiful with a real cute fit size up. Read more
items.author: Adrian Mitchell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality
items.body: Beautiful sweated and excellent quality. I’m typically an XS but needed a medium in this sweater, runs small. Also gaps a bit between buttons so you’ll need to wear a cami underneath. Very elevated sweater, nice to find this quality on Amazon. Read more
items.author: Angela M. Read

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: I liked the quality of the sweater, but I’m returning it because it was clearly used — the tag was torn and it was dirty. Read more
items.author: Danara Matveeva

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic, feminine, Chanel style
items.body: I love this sweater. I find it to have the classic feminine Chanel vibe. It fit better pre wash and does have gapping around the buttons. This could have been prevented had I not dried it. Even with that issue, I think it’s a timeless look that belongs in every ladies closet. Read more
items.author: christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Classy
items.body: Received so many compliments on this sweater. It’s not too thick or thin. Buttons are quality and comfort is great. Wore it with jeans and heels for a business casual look and received many questions about which luxury retailer it came from. There’s a small run in the hem of the sweater on the right side after less than 1 day of wear, but it’ll be easy to fix. Read more
items.author: NicoleChrisstine

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Purple, Yellow, Pink-02, Green-02, Multicolor, Black-04, Blue-05. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
